decision_conditions: Cycle and refuse, details to be submitte
access and parking to be provided
Refuse for non-duplex units and bulky go
description: Demolition of existing buildings, erection of a building between 4 and 8 storeys with a total of 95 residential dwellings, formation of vehicular accesses and provision of associated off-street parking, landscaping and amenity space ,refuse, cycle storage, all other associated works and a publicly accessible cycle and pedestrian link.
